verses.verse: Judge <WG2919> <WG5720> not <WG3361>, that <WG3363> ye be <WG2919> not <WG3363> judged <WG2919> <WG5686>.

Or <WG2228> how <WG4459> wilt thou say <WG2046> <WG5692> to thy <WG4675> brother <WG80>, Let <WG863> <WG5628> me pull out <WG1544> <WG5632> the mote <WG2595> out of <WG575> thine <WG4675> eye <WG3788>; and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, a beam <WG1385> is in <WG1722> thine own <WG4675> eye <WG3788>?

Thou hypocrite <WG5273>, first <WG4412> cast out <WG1544> <WG5628> the beam <WG1385> out of <WG1537> thine own <WG4675> eye <WG3788>; and <WG2532> then <WG5119> shalt thou see clearly <WG1227> <WG5692> to cast out <WG1544> <WG5629> the mote <WG2595> out of <WG1537> thy <WG4675> brother's <WG80> eye <WG3788>.

Give <WG1325> <WG5632> not <WG3361> that which <WG3588> is holy <WG40> unto the dogs <WG2965>, neither <WG3366> cast <WG906> <WG5632> ye your <WG5216> pearls <WG3135> before <WG1715> swine <WG5519>, lest <WG3379> they trample <WG2662> <WG5661> them <WG846> under <WG1722> their <WG846> feet <WG4228>, and <WG2532> turn again <WG4762> <WG5651> and rend <WG4486> <WG5661> you <WG5209>.

Ask <WG154> <WG5720>, and <WG2532> it shall be given <WG1325> <WG5701> you <WG5213>; seek <WG2212> <WG5720>, and <WG2532> ye shall find <WG2147> <WG5692>; knock <WG2925> <WG5720>, and <WG2532> it shall be opened <WG455> <WG5691> unto you <WG5213>:

Or <WG2228> what <WG5101> man <WG444> is <WG2076> <WG5748> there of <WG1537> you <WG5216>, whom <WG3739> if <WG1437> his <WG846> son <WG5207> ask <WG154> <WG5661> bread <WG740>, will he give <WG3361> <WG1929> <WG5692> him <WG846> a stone <WG3037>?

If <WG1487> ye <WG5210> then <WG3767>, being <WG5607> <WG5752> evil <WG4190>, know <WG1492> <WG5758> how to give <WG1325> <WG5721> good <WG18> gifts <WG1390> unto your <WG5216> children <WG5043>, how much <WG4214> more <WG3123> shall your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> give <WG1325> <WG5692> good things <WG18> to them that ask <WG154> <WG5723> him <WG846>?

Enter ye in <WG1525> <WG5628> at <WG1223> the strait <WG4728> gate <WG4439>: for <WG3754> wide <WG4116> is the gate <WG4439>, and <WG2532> broad <WG2149> is the way <WG3598>, that leadeth <WG520> <WG5723> to <WG1519> destruction <WG684>, and <WG2532> many <WG4183> there be <WG1526> <WG5748> which <WG3588> go in <WG1525> <WG5740> thereat <WG1223> <WG846>:

Because <WG3754> strait <WG4728> is the gate <WG4439>, and <WG2532> narrow <WG2346> <WG5772> is the way <WG3598>, which <WG3588> leadeth <WG520> <WG5723> unto <WG1519> life <WG2222>, and <WG2532> few <WG3641> there be <WG1526> <WG5748> that find <WG2147> <WG5723> it <WG846>.

Beware <WG1161> <WG4337> <WG5720> of <WG575> false prophets <WG5578>, which <WG3748> come <WG2064> <WG5736> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> sheep's <WG4263> clothing <WG1742>, but <WG1161> inwardly <WG2081> they are <WG1526> <WG5748> ravening <WG727> wolves <WG3074>.

Ye shall know <WG1921> <WG5695> them <WG846> by <WG575> their <WG846> fruits <WG2590> <WG3385>. Do men gather <WG4816> <WG5719> grapes <WG4718> of <WG575> tshofars <WG173>, or <WG2228> figs <WG4810> of <WG575> thistles <WG5146>?

Havahn so <WG3779> every <WG3956> good <WG18> tree <WG1186> bringeth forth <WG4160> <WG5719> good <WG2570> fruit <WG2590>; but <WG1161> a corrupt <WG4550> tree <WG1186> bringeth forth <WG4160> <WG5719> evil <WG4190> fruit <WG2590>.

A good <WG18> tree <WG1186> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> <WG5736> bring forth <WG4160> <WG5721> evil <WG4190> fruit <WG2590>, neither <WG3761> can a corrupt <WG4550> tree <WG1186> bring forth <WG4160> <WG5721> good <WG2570> fruit <WG2590>.

Wherefore <WG686> by <WG575> their <WG846> fruits <WG2590> ye shall know <WG1921> <WG5695> them <WG846>.

Not <WG3756> every one <WG3956> that saith <WG3004> <WG5723> unto me <WG3427>, YY <WG2962>, YY <WG2962>, shall enter <WG1525> <WG5695> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772>; but <WG235> he that doeth <WG4160> <WG5723> the will <WG2307> of my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> which is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

Many <WG4183> will say <WG2046> <WG5692> to me <WG3427> in <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250>, YY <WG2962>, YY <WG2962>, have we <WG4395> not <WG3756> prophesied <WG4395> <WG5656> in thy <WG4674> name <WG3686>? and <WG2532> in thy <WG4674> name <WG3686> have cast out <WG1544> <WG5627> devils <WG1140>? and <WG2532> in thy <WG4674> name <WG3686> done <WG4160> <WG5656> many <WG4183> wonderful works <WG1411>?

And <WG2532> then <WG5119> will I profess <WG3670> <WG5692> unto them <WG846>, <WG3754> I never <WG3763> knew <WG1097> <WG5627> you <WG5209>: depart <WG672> <WG5720> from <WG575> me <WG1700>, ye that work <WG2038> <WG5740> iniquity <WG458>.

Therefore <WG3767> whosoever <WG3956> <WG3748> heareth <WG191> <WG5719> these <WG5128> sayings <WG3056> of mine <WG3450>, and <WG2532> doeth <WG4160> <WG5719> them <WG846>, I will liken <WG3666> <WG5692> him <WG846> unto a wise <WG5429> man <WG435>, which <WG3748> built <WG3618> <WG5656> his <WG846> house <WG3614> upon <WG1909> a rock <WG4073>:
